company_commercial_names: o grupo m hotéis | grupo m hotéis | grupo m hoteis
short_description: o grupo m hotéis is a hotel based in espinho, portugal.
long_description: a cidade de espinho situa-se no litoral norte, está incluída na região norte e sub-região do grande porto, pertencendo ainda à grande área metropolitana do porto. a cidade de espinho tem para oferecer, além das suas praias, muitos outros atractivos como o mais antigo campo de golfe da península ibérica, casino, piscinas, fórum de arte e cultura, a maior feira semanal do país e um balneário marinho de talassoterapia, único em portugal.
business_tags: large acreage | golf camps | ultimate comfort
generated_description: grupo m hoteis is a hospitality company based in espinho, aveiro. the company operates several accommodations, including a residential pension, hotel m, and apartments. espinho is located on the north coast of portugal, within the norte region and the grande porto sub-region, and is part of the greater metropolitan area of porto. the city offers various attractions such as the oldest golf course in the iberian peninsula, a casino, swimming pools, an art and culture forum, the country's largest weekly market, and a marine spa. visitors can enjoy a wide range of activities including discos, bars, karting, various sports, a planetarium, cyber spaces, cinema, and exhibition galleries.
